content.rendered:
Part-Time Urgent Care Medical Assistant | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Part-Time position, shift-work schedule, noon-midnight
  • RMA or CMA preferred
  • 2+ years experience preferred
  • Must be CPR certified
  • Will be required to draw blood, give injections and take x-rays
  • EMR use a plus
  • Experience in FP, IM, Peds, urgent care or emergency medicine
  • $10+/hour
